data.message: I wanna say that you are the sexist rapper to ever live Dre must have fallen for you real hard I sure did MMLP opened up a new world for me I will never forget the times I had to read the words while you rap then you used words like Guns knives wives slut's bitch IMA kill you ,you don't wanna fuck with me you are better than 2pac and here's why Mr Shakaur could not  act back this game is not for sisies poesies you had an imprint and a real good vision on how you would like to end things, May this new take make me happy again I will always love you and your music...

replies.message: GTOH  just focus on your "Eminem and drop PAC name out of this shits, y'all Stans can be so narrow minded sometimes
I can use PAC as long as its the truth lol I'm sure PAC won't mind he was the greatest writer of my time
